translation.en: You're supposed to push your career forward,
translation.ja: キャリアを積んで

translation.en: your athleticism forward, you know, your strive for being a great athlete.
translation.ja: すばらしい選手になるために 努力すべきだと

translation.en: But when it came down to it, you know, I was a frat boy,
translation.ja: でも 僕は 単なるガキに過ぎなかった

translation.en: and it's just my frat was the football team.
translation.ja: アメフトチームのね

translation.en: I loved what I did. I loved the freedom.
translation.ja: 自由に遊び回って

translation.en: I loved being the guy that got to go do all these amazing things on and off the field.
translation.ja: 試合以外の時には 楽しいことがしたかった

translation.en: You know, but at some point in time, you have to look back
translation.ja: でも 振り返るとこう思う

translation.en: and think, Fuck, was enough ever enough?
translation.ja: “それでよかったのか？”と

translation.en: You know, are you ever gonna be satisfied, or you're just gonna continue living that frat- boy life
translation.ja: ガキのような暮らしを 続けてきた

translation.en: for year after year after year
translation.ja: 何年もずっとね

translation.en: until you finally look up, and you're still living it,
translation.ja: そして気づいたんだ

translation.en: and it's been detrimental to where you wanted to go in life and what you wanted to do.
translation.ja: いかに自分の人生を ムダにしてたかを

translation.en: You know, it's hard for me to sit back and look at these days.
translation.ja: 過去を振り返るのはつらい

translation.en: It feels like a distant memory for the most part.
translation.ja: ほとんどが 遠い昔のことに思える

translation.en: But, you know, I'm very much on the pursuit of happiness
translation.ja: でも 今は数年前よりも

translation.en: in a way more simplistic form than I was years ago.
translation.ja: シンプルな幸せを 探し求めてる

translation.en: I don't really see myself as the… as the Johnny- Football- craze
translation.ja: ジョニー･ フットボールとしての僕が

translation.en: that's kinda… thatt's kinda swept Aggielands. That swept around the nation a little bit.
translation.ja: 大学だけじゃなく国中で 注目されてる

translation.en: Um, I see myself as Johnny Manziel.
translation.ja: でも 僕はジョニー･マンゼルだ

translation.en: I'm a guy from Kerrville, Texas, who just tried to be a laid- back guy
translation.ja: テキサス育ちの おおらかな性格で

translation.en: who likes to hang out with my friends
translation.ja: 友達と遊ぶのが好きだ

translation.en: and be a normal college student just like anybody else.
translation.ja: 普通の大学生と変わらない
